Our success is built on creating long-lasting partnerships with our investors to offer Real Assets with Real Returns.

values.text: We strive to be the partner of choice for investors, developers and communities, building strong relationships that deliver long-term solutions and success.
With 80+ years of combined experience, we are committed to highest standards of transparency, honesty and ethics in all our business dealings.

We combine deep local knowledge with global investment expertise to ensure our investment strategies are innovative, data-led and reliable.  Our team consistently delivers a best-in-class approach to seeking superior risk-adjusted returns in the Canadian real estate markets.
We build and maintain trust through transparency, consistency and collaboration in our dealings with all our stakeholders.
WWe invest in responsibly designed developments to alleviate Canada’s housing shortage and deliver lasting environmental and social benefits to communities.

advantage.text: Canada stands out as a prime investment destination in the G7 due to its fast-growing, stable economy, abundant natural resources, AAA credit rating, rapidly rising population, and high housing demand. Canada’s population is forecast to grow 6.5 million by 2050, with a compounded annual growth rate of 3%.
This rapid growth, combined with a projected housing shortage of over 3.5 million homes by 2030, makes the Canadian residential real estate market a highly attractive investment opportunity.

diversifyHead: Diversify your portfolio with highly attractive Canadian real estate
diversify:
Our investors can access varied investment opportunities including our exclusive pipeline of 45+ premium, community-centred developments in Ontario, Canada. This pipeline includes many purpose built developments for the rental market that have gone through an extensive development and permitting process and are shovel ready.

This exclusive pipeline of investment opportunities, combined with our thorough due diligence and hands-on asset management, helps us deliver superior risk adjusted returns to our investors.
